DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of our study to quantitatively examine the stress levels prior to surgery and the use of analgesics post surgery in both children and their parents following a preoperative intervention with a medical clown compared to children that were not exposed to this intervention.
DOC.brief_title: The Impact of Medical Clowning on Pain and Stress Level in Pediatric Patients Undergoing Hernia Repair Surgery LAUGH Study.
DOC.criteria: ages 410 years old undergoing elective umbilical or inguinal hernia repair surgery ASA Physical Status = 1
